basic_info.description:
ðŸ‘‹ I'm Mutiah. Just graduated with a Master's degree in AI and a background in Technical Support. My passion for leveraging technology to tackle complex challenges led me to specialize in the exciting fields of AI and Robotics. I believe these fields hold immense potential to create transformative change, and I'm eager to be a part of it. 
As a true AI and Robotics enthusiast, I enjoy dreaming up scenarios, extracting insights from data, crafting innovative solutions, coding up algorithms, and even giving robots a personality of their own. 
When it comes to tech tools, I'm your go-to person for Python, SQL, and AWS. I love crafting ML models, tinkering with deep learning algorithms, and getting my hands dirty with ROS (Robot Operating System). But what makes me happy the most is applying my skills to real-world problems, where I can see my work make a genuine impact. 
I'm not just a code-slinging machine, I also excel at collaborating with anyone and everyone on the team. My communication skills, both written and spoken, are top-notch, so everyone's on the same page when it comes to project needs and seeing results. 
So, if you're looking for someone who's passionate about AI and Robotics, loves a good challenge, and can explain things clearly, well, let's chat!ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Predicting Asset Volatility
projects.description: Developed a GARCH time series forecast model for predicting asset volatility. Acquired stock data using an API and implemented data cleaning procedures. Stored cleaned data eï¬€iciently in a SQLite database for further analysis. Engineered a custom API to serve predictions generated by the GARCH time series model

projects.title: Bankruptcy Prediction
projects.description: Implemented random forest and gradient boosting models to predict the likelihood of a company going bankrupt. Demonstrated proficiency in navigating the Linux command line environment. Addressed imbalanced data challenges through resampling techniques for enhanced model performance. Evaluated model performance using precision and recall metrics.

projects.title: Humanoid Robot Expression
projects.description: Developed a ROS package to assess the likelihood of a social humanoid robot expressing emotions during interactions with children, enhancing human-robot interaction capabilities. Implemented a launch file to activate the system, generating numerical predictions and publishing them on four distinct ROS topics every 10 seconds for real-time analysis and feedback.

projects.title: Consumer Segmentation in the US
projects.description: Constructed a k-means model to cluster US consumers into distinct groups to identify households encountering challenges in obtaining credit. Utilized principal component analysis (PCA) for effective data visualization and feature reduction. Developed an interactive dashboard using Dash to present and explore the clustering results.

projects.title: London Tube Route Finder: A Comparative Analysis of Search Algorithms
projects.description: This project aims to develop a route finder using agenda-based search mechanisms applied to the London Tube map dataset. The project implements and evaluates search algorithms such as Depth-First Search (DFS), Breadth-First Search (BFS), Uniform-Cost Search (UCS), and Heuristic Search for efficiency comparison.

projects.title: Wearable Device for Rehabilitation
projects.description: Designed and developed a wearable device for pediatric cerebral palsy rehabilitation, integrating haptic, visual, and auditory feedback. Implemented remote monitoring features to track patient progress. Utilized serious gamification by integrating the wearable device with a game interface to enhance patient engagement and motivation.

certifications.title: Hugging Face NLP Course
certifications.description: Currently enrolled in a Transformers specialization Hugging face course to gain expertise in leveraging the Hugging Face ecosystem for Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks. This program is enhancing my skills in building and fine-tuning Transformer models, processing text data with Datasets and Tokenizers, and exploring applications beyond NLP.

certifications.title: Data Engineering in AWS
certifications.description: A coursera course that delves into the essential techniques for preparing data for machine learning models. I worked on various data gathering approaches, analyzed strategies for handling missing data, and gained hands-on experience implementing feature extraction and selection methods like Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and Variance Thresholds.

certifications.title: Python Programming
certifications.description: A Python course teaching Python programming, its data structures and syntax
